validations.min: Value must be at least {number} characters long
validations.email: Value must be a valid email
validations.invalid: Value is not a valid one
validations.boolean: Must be either true or false
validations.pinCodeSame: New PIN code is the same as current
validations.passwordSame: New password is the same as current

inviteUsersDialog.title: Invite users
inviteUsersDialog.description: Users will receive an email with a registration link

deleteUsersDialog.title: Do you want to delete {count, plural, =1 {the user} other {# users}}
deleteUsersDialog.description: This action is permanent and cannot be undone
deleteUsersDialog.errorToast: Something went wrong with the deletion

emailAccordion.title: Update Email
emailAccordion.description: Receive a link to change your email
emailAccordion.textOne: You will receive an email with a link where you can change your email.
emailAccordion.textTwo: The link is active for 1 hour.

passwordAccordion.updateDescription: Choose a password for your account
passwordAccordion.updateTextOne: Enter your current password and then the new one to confirm the change
passwordAccordion.createDescription: Enter a password of at least 8 characters
passwordAccordion.createTextOne: Enter your current password and then the new one to confirm the change

pinAccordion.updateDescription: Choose a new 4-digit PIN for your account
pinAccordion.updateTextOne: Enter your current PIN and then the new one to confirm the change
pinAccordion.createDescription: Choose a 4-digit PIN for your account
pinAccordion.createTextOne: Enter your current PIN and then the new one to confirm the change
pinAccordion.pinDescription: Your PIN is encrypted and securely stored.

dangerAccordion.title: Delete Account
dangerAccordion.textOne: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
dangerAccordion.textTwo: Confirm by typing Delete Account to delete your account.

userAccordion.textOne: This is your public profile that other users and admins can see.
